resources.string: Christos Markakis is a student at PACE University currently studying to get his Master\'s in Computer Science. He completed a Bachelor\'s of Science in CS as well back in May 2022 at the State University of New York at Albany and currently works as a software developer. Some of Christos\'s favorite areas in Computer Science are Operating Systems, Game/Game Engine Development, GPU Parallel Programming and Compilers.
Some of my favorite hobbies include coding, game dev, weightlifting, hiking and music.
I can be reached at christos2email@fake.com
